name: VORACIOUS
description:
Feed the Guts, Gears, and Circuits of your slain enemies to the Grinder, for your companions hunger is VORACIOUS.

News: 

  • We are going to be doing a post-jam patch to fix performance issues! 

The Story So Far:

The Lands of Calcifeira have changed. Ravaged by War and Famine, only ruin remains. Alast you endure these conditions, long ago sworn an oath to satisfy the hunger of the Old One. Hunt and shoot the abhorrent creatures that dwell in the ruins. Use them to feed the Old One, so that its light may survive and bring life back to our home. But be careful there are forces who would like to see that light squashed. The stronger the Old One gets, so to those who would do evil onto us.

Controls:
[W][A][S][D] - Move
(Mouse) - Aim Camera
[E] - Pickup/Use
[R] - Reload
[C]/(Mouse Wheel) - Cycle Weapons
(LMB) - Shoot
